text:
The Office of Labor Standards Enforcement shall establish a community-based outreach program to conduct education and outreach to employees. In partnership with organizations involved in the community-based outreach program, the Office of Labor Standards shall create outreach materials that are designed for workers in particular industries.
(Added by Ord. 205-06, File No. 060247, App. 7/25/2006; amended by Ord. 175-11, File No. 110594, App. 9/16/2011, Eff. 10/16/2011)
